subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Alabama Coach Nick Saban and Georgia defensive coordinator Todd Grantham, a former Saban assistant, each use the same maxim when explaining their vision of football: “Big people beat up little people.”
snippet: Alabama Coach Nick Saban and Georgia defensive coordinator Todd Grantham, a former Saban assistant, each use the same maxim when explaining their vision of football: “Big people beat up little people.”
